channel.title: Mamiya RB67 on Grainy Photos
channel.description: Recent content in Mamiya RB67 on Grainy Photos

item.title: Mamiya RB67
item.description: About the Mamiya RB67, a legendary medium-format film camera that has gained immense popularity among professional photographers and enthusiasts since its introduction in 1970.

item.title: A Sunday stroll on the Via Verde
item.description: Ten photos taken on the Via Verde shot on Kodak Porta 160 film using a Mamiya RB67 camera during a Sunday afternoon stroll.

item.title: Citroen 2CV photos with the Mamiya RB67
item.description: I love classic cars and film cameras, so I jumped at the chance of photographing a CitroÃ«n 2CV with my Mamiya RB67 vintage film camera - see all the film photos.
